backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functions or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two Valentine UI features to frontend/index.html with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of frontend/index.html and App.tsx.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config layer defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling for the site.
frontend/index.html: Standalone Valentine proposal page with decorations, floating elements, Yes/No interactions, a persistent bottom-right photo frame, and background music trigger logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component that immediately redirects to index.html while preserving query params and renders a simple loading screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering App with Tailwind styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing implemented and pending features related to persistent image display and background music.
